docs.title: wikipedia_quantum_mechanics.txt
docs.text: Quantum mechanics is a fundamental theory in physics that describes the physical properties of nature at the scale of atoms and subatomic particles.

docs.title: wikipedia_nobel_prize.txt
docs.text: Albert Einstein received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921 for his services to theoretical physics, and especially for his discovery of the law of the photoelectric effect.

docs.title: wikipedia_albert_einstein.txt
docs.text: He received the 1921 Nobel Prize in Physics for his services to theoretical physics, and especially for his discovery of the law of the photoelectric effect.

question: What year did Einstein receive the Nobel Prize in Physics?
cot: Einstein received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921 for his discovery of the law of the photoelectric effect. answer is: 1921

docs.title: wikipedia_relativity.txt
docs.text: The theory transformed theoretical physics and astronomy during the 20th century, superseding a 200-year-old theory of mechanics created primarily by Isaac Newton.

docs.title: wikipedia_albert_einstein.txt
docs.text: His mass–energy equivalence formula E = mc², which arises from relativity theory, has been called "the world's most famous equation".

question: What is Einstein's most famous equation?
cot: Einstein's mass–energy equivalence formula E = mc² is called the world's most famous equation. answer is: E = mc²

docs.title: wikipedia_albert_einstein.txt
docs.text: Einstein was born in Ulm, in the Kingdom of Württemberg in the German Empire, on 14 March 1879.

docs.title: wikipedia_relativity.txt
docs.text: The theory of relativity usually encompasses two interrelated physics theories by Albert Einstein: special relativity and general relativity.

docs.title: wikipedia_ulm.txt
docs.text: Ulm is a city in the German state of Baden-Württemberg, situated on the river Danube on the border with Bavaria. The city, which has an estimated population of more than 126,000, forms an urban district and is the administrative seat of the Alb-Donau district. Ulm is famous for having the church with the tallest steeple in the world, the Ulm Minster. The city is also known as the birthplace of Albert Einstein, who was born there on March 14, 1879.

question: What city was Albert Einstein born in?
cot: Albert Einstein was born in Ulm, Germany. answer is: Ulm
